name: app-healthtrack
description: A databox application to see where you've been and how these places impact you
author: Aidan O'Connell

packages.name: Light Level Plotter
packages.purpose: To visualise your smartphone's light level in real time
packages.risks: Estimating time of day and perhaps even location based on light patterns over time.
packages.benefits: A cool demo of plotting phone light levels.
